name: Scroll progress bar
tagline: Display a progress bar while scrolling down on a website.
body:
# ScrollProgressBar

__ScrollProgressBar__ is an Eager app which displays a progress bar when you scroll down a page.

You can change the color, the with and the position of the progress bar.

Report bugs, improvements or ideas to [@p_wueth](https://twitter.com/p_wueth) on Twitter.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
